name: ts-cms
description: TweetScheduler CMS - Monorepo with NestJS backend and Next.js frontend
author: Marcos Rocha <marcosrocha85@gmail.com>

scripts.dev: concurrently "cd apps/backend && npm run dev" "cd apps/frontend && npm run dev" --names "backend,frontend" --prefix-colors "blue,magenta"
scripts.build: cd apps/backend && npm run build && cd ../frontend && npm run build
scripts.lint: cd apps/backend && npm run lint && cd ../frontend && npm run lint
